    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

            <entry>cahi1:data_114107</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Investigating induced current</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Nachforschender geverursachter Strom</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Courant induit d'investigation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Corrente induzida investigando</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Corrente indotta di studio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η έρευνα προκάλεσε το ρεύμα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Corriente inducida que investiga</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows an experimental set-up used to investigate an induced current using a magnet and a long wire connected to a galvanometer.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">galvanometers</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">induced current</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnetic field</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnets</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">wires</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt eine experimentelle 
Installation, die verwendet wird, um einen geverursachten Strom mit 
einem Magneten und einer langen Leitung nachzuforschen angeschlossen 
werden an einen Galvanometer.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre une installation 
expérimentale employée pour étudier un courant induit en utilisant 
un aimant et un long fil reliés à un galvanomètre.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra uma instalação 
experimental usada investigar uma corrente induzida usando um ímã e 
um fio longo conectados a um galvanômetro.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra una messa a punto 
sperimentale usata per studiare una corrente indotta usando un magnete
e un legare lungo collegati ad un galvanometro.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει πειραματική οργάνωση που 
χρησιμοποιείται για να ερευνήσει ένα προκληθέν ρεύμα 
χρησιμοποιώντας έναν μαγνήτη και ένα μακρύ καλώδιο που 
συνδέονται με ένα γαλβανόμετρο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra una disposición 
experimental usada para investigar una corriente inducida usando un 
imán y un alambre largo conectados con un galvanómetro.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Galvanometer</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">geverursachter Strom</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">magnetisch fangen Sie auf</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
